1: In (the) name//(of) Allah//the Most Gracious//the Most Merciful
2: All praises and thanks//(be) to Allah//the Lord//of the universe
5: You Alone//we worship//and You Alone//we ask for help
7: (The) path//(of) those//You have bestowed (Your) Favors//on them//not (of)//those who earned (Your) wrath//on themselves//and not//(of) those who go astray
